text: Swimming was contested at the 2015 Summer Universiade from July 4 to 11 in Gwangju, South Korea. The swimming competitions was held at the Nambu University International Aquatics Center. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== ===Men's events=== {| |- |50 m freestyle | || 22.22 | || 22.24 | || 22.34
